name: Byzantine-inspired hand-knit hat made with hand-spun wool
description:
This soft and warm hat was handknit and designed by Vera Videnovich using chestnut brown yarn is hand-spun from 100% wool roving bought at the Michigan Fiber Festival.

20" around at the brim by 12" tall.

* * * *

Hand wash finished garments in cold water and dry flat.

Yarns from a smoke-free, pet-friendly home.

* * * *

name: Byzantine-inspired cable-knit hat made with hand-spun wool
description:
This soft and warm cable-patterned hat was handknit and designed by Vera Videnovich using chestnut brown yarn is hand-spun from 100% wool roving bought at the Michigan Fiber Festival.

20" around at the brim (the rib pattern expands) by 12" tall.

* * * *

Hand wash finished garments in cold water and dry flat.

Yarns from a smoke-free, pet-friendly home.

* * * *

name: Cobweb Miniskirt
description:
Wear it with leggings or with layers! This easy-to-care for crochet miniskirt is made with grey acrylic yarn. The drawstring (36") waistband can be worn to the side and adjusts for multiple waist (and hip!) sizes. The A-line shape is flattering for all figures and gives a nice swing as you walk.

Measurements:
36" waistband. 19" length.

* * * * * *

From a smoke-free, pet-friendly home.

Wash in a lingerie bag and dry on gentle settings for best results.

* * * * * * *

All sales final. No exchanges or returns.
